title: Remakes = Free LP?!
body: Remakes are seriously a waste of time. You enter a game, get first blood and notices its a remake. Right now it is  unfair for people who won their lanes. From experience, it is definitely a waste of time. Spending around ten minutes only for it to be a remake.You get no LP or IP.My suggestion is that every remakes will reward each player a small amount of ranked points. What do you think?

replies.body: my issue is you can remake without the afk losing lp. so if they want to dodge for w/e they can just afk and it counts as a remake 0 lp loss
Why should you get LP for a remake? It's called a remake for a reason.

why? Well Danny, remakes are just annoying. Considering the queue and banning time, its a waste of time. You get nothing. Seriously, i can wait ten mins for a match, pick and ban champions.In game.Remake happens. Boom! . My point is, its just a waste of time.

The whole point of LP is that you gain it when you win and lose it when you lose. If you get LP for doing nothing, then that completely defeats the purpose. Also how is that far for the team with the afk?

It's actually not unfair. Up until a month or so ago they would have lost 15+ LP after wasting 20 minutes waiting to Surrender. Now they neither have to wait to /ff nor do they lose any LP.

Up until a month ago, the team without the AFK would have stomped for 20 minutes and gained 15+ LP. Now they waste 10+ minutes in queue, don't get to play, or get any LP. THAT is unfair.

Give them 5 LP and send them on their way.

If a player is <5 LP off promos, however, put them on 100 LP but don't put them in promos but if they win that game they get a free win in promos.
doesn't matter if Caitlyn did snowball, she still would of won, because it's a 4v5
yeah but then a remake happens. Boom! Waste of time and a free victory thrown into the trash.
But it's a waste of time for the team that has an AFK player, since they have to wait 20 mins before they can surrender
Yeah, but its also a waste of time for people who queue for like 10mins, ban etc. And once they get into a game, its a remake. You get nothing for the time you've spent.
You can't remake if there has been a first blood....
actually you can.

Nup

_"UPDATED: A first blood against a player’s team before they leave/dc prevents a remake vote"_

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/player-behavior/play-games-matter/remake
yeah its bugged ive gotten first blood and then had a remake happen when the enemy team has the afk atleast 6 times now

> A first blood against a player’s team **_before_**

If the player is marked as dc/afk before first blood happens then you can still remake. You cannot remake if they afk/dc after FB.
Oh didn't know it was a bug sorry :)

How can you determine whether you won a lane or not in first 3 minutes ?

I didnt actually mean that. What i ment was that in the first 3 mins you could've gotten a kill or so. That kill could basically lead to a snowball and maybe a win. An example of this could be cait vs vayne bot. Cait would get a double kill and then a remake happens.The cait would've snowballed so hard that it could've been a win. But then a remake happens and you basically waste time and gain 0 LP even after your double kill.

The problem with this is that it can be easily abused. People deliberately dc'ing and conceding a time penalty in exchange for free ip. Having said that, free ip could be rewarded to all on the opposing team that didn't dc
